title.bibl: Skandinaven, Apr. 14, 1907. [Bjorgvin to Give Concert Sunday]

div.bibl: Skandinaven, Apr. 14, 1907. [BJORGVIN TO GIVE CONCERT SUNDAY]

body.p: Bjorgvin Singing Society will celebrate its twenty-fifth anniversary with a great concert in the Garrick Theatre on Sunday April 14, which will mark a new milestone in the Norwegian community in Chicago.
It also has a children's choir and a ladies' choir both of which will sing tonight at the concert. The "Bjorgvin" we must tell you is the owner of its own hall.
